validation.validation: The Field Display XIP Configuration Reference specified is in use for a different Evaluation View Section Reference.
You must enter ‘Security Group’, ‘Hide For All’, or leave the Field Display Criterion empty for all External Identification Points except Admissions Assessment - Decision Recommendation.

When 'Security Group' is supplied in Field Display Criterion, either 'Required For' or 'Hidden For' must be supplied as well.  Additionally, 'Required For' and 'Hidden For' are not allowed unless 'Security Group' is supplied.
You must enter ‘Security Group’, ‘Hide For All’, 'Require For All', or leave the Field Display Criterion empty for External Identification Point: Admissions Assessment - Decision Recommendation.
The field 'Required For' is only allowed for External Identification Point: Admissions Assessment - Decision Recommendation.
The specified External Identification Point (XIP) Reference is not valid for the Evaluation Tab Data Section it is being supplied for.
The Evaluation View Section Reference specified is in use for a different Evaluation View Reference.
